name: Children of Tartaros
description:
Children of Tartaros is my entry project to Game Development.

It's an Arena Fighting Game where your goal is to survive and fight the other Arena Combatants to earn Gold and collect New Weapons.

it's still early in Development. 

Planned Features : 

  • Different Weapon Types : Spears, Two Handed, Throwables
  • Different Enemy Types
  • Multiple Arenas with different Environment , Weapons and Enemies
  • Bossfights Inbetween the Arenas

If you have any Ideas Which you would like to see in the game write it in the comments or on twitter @HoboliciousL
